utils.video.filters.source
Class SourceFilter

java.lang.Object
  utils.video.filters.VideoFilter
      utils.video.filters.source.SourceFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
StateListener
public class SourceFilter
extends VideoFilter

Takes the data coming from the input device and puts it on its output link, to be used by other filters.

Author:
Creative
